task.title: How to improve your slide
task.shortdesc: Short step-by-step guidance on how to improve your classic cross-country skiing technique.

taskbody.context: This procedure can help you improve your classical technique, if you already try to perform it well (no Å¡upiny or tourists welcome here), but you still feel you don't gain as much as you could from it.

step.cmd: Bend your body to approximately 60 degrees over the track.
One hand with a pole forward, the opposite leg back.

Push as much as you can by your hand and right at this moment slide forward by the opposite leg, push to the snow by its opposite leg and at the same time prepare its opposite hand into the air in front of you.

info.note: The rhythm is crucial in this technique so keep it and care about it, but the best way how to do so is actually not thinking about it that much so in some way don't care about it and it will work all fine...

Remember, we have style on our side against these skaters, so care to look good on the track and pick carefully the clothes so that you ski with elegance and majesty at least, if we couldn't be faster than them...
